subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Raiders’ David Carr, the Jaguars’ Blake Bortles and the Vikings’ Teddy Bridgewater had substantial playing time as rookies last season and are being counted on to take a big step forward in 2015.
snippet: The Raiders’ David Carr, the Jaguars’ Blake Bortles and the Vikings’ Teddy Bridgewater had substantial playing time as rookies last season and are being counted on to take a big step forward in 2015.
